item.title: my first real post
item.description: Okay, I told myself I would actually use this site a year ago and clearly that never happened. However, after BPS, I realized I really should be documenting things better for my own memory and to see a timeline of progress. With that being said, this is my first post for the blog series :D

item.title: Publications
item.description:
• coming soon
  • Oh, TJ., Krishnamurthy, V., Han, J.W., Zhu, J., Beg, Z., Mehfooz, A., Gworek, B., Shapiro, D.J., Zhang, K. (2024) Spatiotemporal Control of Inflammatory Lytic Cell Death Through Optogenetic Induction of RIPK3 Oligomerization. J Mol Biol. 436(13):168628. doi: 10.1016/j.jmb.2024.168628
  • Oh, TJ.#, Gworek, B.#, Mehfooz, A.#, & Zhang, K. (2024) Gene delivery and analysis of optogenetic induction of lytic cell death. Current Protocols, 4, e1023. doi: 10.1002/cpz1.1023 (#, equally contributed)

item.title: things that might not fit a typical page
item.description: Here are just random things that don’t quite fit a page. I’ll update this more later on.
